title: Experience the Worlds Final live at HOYTS this weekend!

replies.body:
I'll see you Sydney siders at Hoyts Broadway
I'll be your host for the evening, and I do very much hope you'll have a great night :)
Do we get a gift bag? {{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
The ticket comes with a 3 Day IP Boost, there's no showbag.
Wow, I was really hoping for a Showbag{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
yeah the loot bag is way better than a 3 day ip boost :'(

But there will be stuff (if ur at the Sylvia Park one) given out visit this link https://www.facebook.com/uoalolclub/
Thx Riot :D

But this club at Hoyts is giving free merch away 
https://www.facebook.com/uoalolclub/
There's no merch store at HOYTS no.

Can't wait for another SKT T1 skins
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

I'll be going to Hoyts Riccarton in Christchurch, New Zealand, and I just wanted to know whether or not we're allowed to leave and return to the cinema for food and bathroom breaks without being locked out.
Will the stream be via satellite or the net at the cinemas?
Live via satellite, more details here: http://www.hoyts.com.au/movies/2016/league_of_legends_2016_world_championship_finals.aspx
Man the amount of tickets of sold is wack {{champion:43}}
